attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Diep River Used Cars
attributes.description:
ACTIVE SERVICE PLAN OF 48MONTHS/61500KM Complimentary Service Plan!!! DEMO MODEL AVAILABLE!!!
ENQUIRE NOW and you will be connected to one of our professional sales executives who will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. ENQUIRE NOW and we will tailor make a finance package that will not only suite your need but you pocket too as we deal through all major finance institutions and will fight for the best rate in town.
ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY

WHY FORD APPROVED
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles
attributes.title: 2022 Ford EcoSport 1.0 EcoBoost Titanium

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Airport Park Germiston Used Cars
attributes.description: If you looking for quality Pre-Owned Vehicles no further.Our vehicles go through a i60-pont check quality check to ensure you are getting value for your money.Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.Delivery can be arranged nationwide.Price excludes admin and delivery fee.Finance can be arranged on premises and trade ins welcome.We at Motus ford Germiston strive for perfection,so every customer makes the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect on our showroom floor.We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives,to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.title: 2022 Ford Ranger 3.2 TDCi XLT Auto Double-Cab

attributes.description: Motus Ford Kroonstad offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is 101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.

attributes.title: 2021 Nissan X-Trail 2.5 Acenta 4x4 Auto

attributes.description: FULL WARRANTY INCLUDED one owner since new, AS NEW CONDITION, not a scratch, fully serviced and maintained If you are looking at this advert then you probably already know all about this insane machine, so I am not going to bore you with specs and performance stats. I will however wax lyrical about the condition of this particular example. WE KNOW THE PREVIOUS OWNER PERSONALLY. HE WAS ABSOLUTELY FANATICAL ABOUT THE VEHICLE, LOOKS, FEELS, DRIVES AND EVEN SMELLS LIKE A BRAND NEW CAR It was a special order vehicle and has been fitted with every extra and luxury that JAGUAR have to offer. If you consider that a new one like this with these extras is now selling for well over R1.7 MILLION then it doesnt seem fair when you look at this cars selling price, one thing is for sure. THIS IS HEAD AND SHOULDERS THE CLEANEST FTYPE V6 WITH THE LOWEST MILEAGE, COMPREHENSIVE SERVICE HISTORY AND FULL WARRANTY CURRENLTY AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE ANYWHERE IN SA If you are considering buying a similar vehicle then you owe it to yourself to at least have a look at this one before making a decision Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
